erived from an initial analysis 
1 As far as possible, the age group for which these estimates were made was 0–5 years; no adjustment was made if 
only other age groups were reported (e.g. 0–3 years).
2 While most CHNWs are part-time, in some projects full-time CHNWs are hired. Part-time CHNWs were calculated 
as 0.1 full-time equivalents (FTEs).
3 Early estimates of initial reduction in underweight among participants were rapid, for severe malnutrition 13.8% 
to 2.9% from April to November 1997
